attributes.action: Withdraw our Troops from Afghanistan NOW!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Five British Soldiers murdered by an Afghan Policeman....what on earth are our young men and women doing out there after 8 years?

This HAS to be the turning point - if the Taliban are infiltrating the Afghan Police and Military, we HAVE to withdraw our British Troops before more Service Men and Women are killed.

This one event has removed in one action any trust between the Forces of both nations and puts our Troops in more danger than ever.  They cannot be expected to continue their mission under such conditions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
